text.section: The board of trustees may mortgage any real or personal property owned by the library to secure any sums borrowed for making repairs or improvements, or paying off any indebtedness it may owe. The mortgage shall not exceed $1,000,000.

law.history: Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 197, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2801b-3, 2801b-7.
